title: So, You Can Get A Unicorn Dildo Now, If You Want
text:
View this image ›
Paramount Pictures Like horses, but better!
ID: 10764921 2. Of course they deserve their own sex toy, right? View this image ›
Sunn Classic Pictures ID: 10765210 3. BEHOLD! The Unicorn Horn Dildo. View this image ›
geekysextoys.com ID: 10764949 4. These mythical horns “will help stimulate the most magical orgasms,” according the company responsible for them, Geeky Sex Toys. View this image ›
geekysextoys.com ID: 10765225 5. Each toy — made of medical-grade silicone — measures 7.5 inches long and it has a circumference of 5.5 inches at its base. View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10765257 6. Plus, its got a suction cup base, so you can stick it on the wall, or a chair or wherever. View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10765292 7. Geeky Sex Toys also makes, uh, “Mighty Moaning Anal Rangers” butt plugs… View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10764950 8. Pokémoan sex toys… View this image ›
geekysextoys.com ID: 10765314 9. …and a “Supercock Man of Silicone” dildo, complete with his own cape. View this image ›
geekysextoys.com Not ONLY heroes wear capes, tbh.
ID: 10765326 10. Do what feels right. View this image ›
